issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: The new combined upgrade scripts for Hive 2.3 to 3.0 transition do not properly set the schema version after they have completed the upgrade.
fields.summary: Standalone metastore SQL upgrade scripts do not properly set schema version

comments.body:
It turns out that the update of the schema version was being done, just in the middle of each upgrade script instead of at the end where it belonged.  This patch moves them to the end and adds a comment so that developers don't make the same mistake again.

This also fixes failures introduced in the Mysql and SqlServer upgrade scripts as part of HIVE-18675.
